message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's split it evenly down the middle.  A fair deal ensures we both benefit.
I'll compromise, 58-42 is a more reasonable split.
Time is running out, and the value decreases with every round.  This offer is a good compromise to ensure we both walk away with something substantial.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. This is a fair compromise.
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all.  This offer is a slight increase from my last and a fair compromise considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'll increase my offer slightly, but I won't go much higher. The pressure is on you, Bob.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a compromise again, but my patience, and the value of this deal, is wearing thin. Let's be reasonable and end this.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm not backing down. This is my final serious offer.
